info.title: UB Mager API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation for UB Mager E-commerce System

get.summary: Get all items in user's cart
get.description: Returns a list of all items in the authenticated user's cart

post.description: Adds a product to the user's cart

product_id.description: Product ID to add to cart

delete.description: Removes all items from the user's cart

get.description: Returns a specific cart item by ID

put.description: Updates the quantity of a specific item in the cart

delete.description: Removes a specific item from the cart completely

post.description: Increases the quantity of a specific cart item by one
Decreases the quantity of a specific cart item by one. If quantity becomes zero, removes the item completely

200.description: Cart item quantity decreased or item removed successfully

get.description: Returns list of products with optional filtering by type, category, and search query

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by product type(s), comma-separated. Use 'all' for all types

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by product category(ies), comma-separated. Use 'all' for all categories

post.description: Stores a new product in the database

get.description: Returns product data for a specific ID
Returns a list of all product types available
Returns a list of product categories for a specific product type

post.description: Authenticates user and returns a token
Destroys the user's current authenticated session and removes tokens

email: The email has already been taken.

post.summary: Verify OTP sent to the user's email to reset password.
Reset user password using the reset token.

404.description: User not found or token not found.

post.summary: Allow authenticated user to change their own password.
Verify user's email address using OTP.

200.description: OTP verified and email status updated.

user_name.description: Name of the user who owns this cart item

product_name.description: Name of the product in cart

bearerAuth.description: Login with email and password to get the authentication token
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
